member.name: M:MyGymProgressApi.Controllers.TrainingController.GetAll
member.summary: Retrieves all training sessions with associated exercises.

member.name: M:MyGymProgressApi.Controllers.TrainingController.GetPage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a paginated list of training sessions.
member.returns: A list of training sessions for the specified page.

member.name: M:MyGymProgressApi.Controllers.TrainingController.GetNumPages
member.summary: Retrieves the number of pages of training sessions.

member.name: M:MyGymProgressApi.Controllers.TrainingController.GetByID(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific training session by ID.
member.param: The ID of the training session to retrieve.
member.returns: The training session if found; otherwise, NotFound.

member.name: M:MyGymProgressApi.Controllers.TrainingController.PostAll(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.IFormFile,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.param: The file identifier for the chunks.

member.name: T:MyGymProgressApi.Handlers.CsvHandler.Records.TrainingSessionCsv
member.summary: Represents a training session as imported from a CSV file, including all related exercises.
